website_summaries.verdict: Razor is a well known brand in the gaming community for a reason. When it comes to comfort, sound quality and durability, they surpass the competition on every front.
pros: The Razor headset is extremely comfortable
Comfortable to wear for over 2 hours before feeling the need to take it off
Even with earrings on, the headset remains comfortable
We loved that the set plugs in via USB – setup was simple and user friendly
Razor Synapse installs when you plug the headset in the first time
You can use Synapse to customize volume levels and color settings
We were blown away by the audio quality
The mic included a mute button, which we appreciated as well
The all black design was made even better by the bright green light from the Razor logo
cons: There's no volume control directly on the headset – volume must be changed on your computer

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING DOSE NOT WORK WITH XBOX ONE. ALL OPTIONS ARE NOT 3.5MM AUDIO. USB ONLY.
customer_reviews.text: Title ses works with Xbox one. Then you receive it an the book clearly reads. Pc mac PlayStation 4. All options are USB no audio jack. And adapters don't work for usb to audio. No Xbox one. Screw my weekend right?
customer_reviews.author: Cyber420

customer_reviews.title: Missleading title/no Xbox
customer_reviews.text: They specifically states that it is compatible for Xbox, mobile, and other devices. This only comes with a USB attachment. There’s no way to get sound from the headphones From your Xbox or mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset for USB on PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than my old ones for call of duty. At first I was upset there was no 3.5 mm plug, and it took me a few minutes to figure out that they plug directly into the PS4 PRO USB port. I didn't know USB was an option for headphones. But they've been good since. A few times I've had to unplug and replug, not sure why but it doesn't happen very often. I think it's the video editing software it something. Doesn't happen in game.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Rock

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about Razer products exactly. but I will NEVER go back to another Razer product in my life. The build quality is atrocious, plus you pay a premium price for plastic? No thanks. The software is clunky and rarely ever works. The sound quality of ALL of their headsets is abysmal Razer's customer service is........... LOL what customer service? Good luck. The ONLY thing Razer does better than all of the competition is RGB lighting. Razer's RGB is the absolute best on the market in terms of options, and brightness. Hands down. But if you want bang for your buck, go Corsair, SteelSeries, Logitech, HyperX, literally anyone but Razer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The cord is horrible which causes shorting
customer_reviews.text: The headset itself seems good enough but this cord. There seems to be no way to keep this rope like cord from twisting itself up. Furthermore, it is more difficult to untangle the cord because of this rope like material. Now after 7 months the mic has quit functioning and has to be plugged in again to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best headset ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this headset... The sound is fantastic, they are very comfortable on my head, they dont slip or anything they are adjustable... The earphones themselves are comfortable also, they cover my ears and dont rub or anything... I love that the mute button is right on the mic itself which by the way sounds very very clear... Hands down worth every penny.. Not sure why I bothered to buy anything but Razer... I would recommend this to anyone. To be fair they are midline pricewise... Not very cheap but not crazy expensive so affordable imo.. Get yours =) you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Destinys Chyld

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, can't sync with your other Chroma devices up under some color scemes due to too few LEDs in the headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaper than Turtle Beach headphones, and sound better, IMO. I'm using these along with the Razer Ornata Chroma, and Razer Lancehead TE Chroma. The only reason I give these 4 stars is because the headphones are the limiting factor when synching up the lights through Razer Synapse. You can't use some of the more complex light scemes and keep everything synched because the headphones have like 1 LED on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Starscream5000

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for gaming if you don't have anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up to try for gaming. They're king of a mixed bag. I'm comparing these to Audio Technica M50x, Audio Technica M40x, and AKG 550 MKII headsets. Pros: - Easy to use, they just work - mic works well. - Good volume adjustment Cons: - Sound quality isn't good. The sounds tends to be muddled and bass heavy. - Feel kind of cheap. Even the less expensive M40x headphones feel better better constructed and they are cheaper. I ended up sending them back and will stick to my AKGs for gaming with an addon mic.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Feuerborn

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising, Headset Does Not Work With Gaming Consoles or phones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones because of the description. "Gaming Headset Works with PC, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, & Mobile Devices - Mercury" I am glad I checked before I gave them to my son for Christmas. These will not work with any of the devices listed in the description other than the Mac or PC. There's a USB connected the headset that cannot be converted to 3.5mm. They do sound good on the PC but keep in mind that's all you will be able to use them on.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: after 1 year they dont work at all.
customer_reviews.text: After one year of use the audio cuts in and out every 5 seconds giving a loud pop, the mic cuts in and out when talking to people and the build quality is horrible especailly on their cable. This is the last razer product I will be buying and their customer support only made it worse after calling them and filling out everything to get a new headset from them using my warranty they closed the case and now I can't make a new case or get a new headset. Horrible company that makes cheap poor quality stuff. Wouldnt recommend especially not long term.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy stay away!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are some of the worst headphones out there for a simple reason. they sound amazing however the quality of the build; the wire in particular is the main issue. it tangles no matter what you do bought a monkey cord to avoid thing and it still found a way to get a slight tangle going on. i say these are terrible because if you do not notice how terrible the wire is when your 1st pair breaks, you may want to get another.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in March for my son and already not working properly. Keeps cutting out and has to be unplugged and plugged back in. Tried all USB ports and no change. No longer returnable and past the date for support. Razer will not honor warranty as it appears that Amazon us not one of their approved resellers.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Really great headphones- may need to replace annually.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that the product has a lifespan of 1 year or less. We have had 2 pair. The first we were able to exchange within the warranty period (USB issue). The second pair missed warranty by a month (USB issue). Headphones purchased after 10/2018 now have 2 year warranty. Best of luck if you purchase. Other than the lifespan issue: 4.5 for gaming- they have great 3D audio and sound 4 for sound quality 5 for noise cancellation - literally cannot hear other people yelling
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Loving these headphones! Great sound, it's really boosted where I can have the volume at 40 and it's where my old headphones were at 100. The only knock is the mic quality drops it down to four stars, it took a while to get it to where I was told the quality was ok. Had to do a bit of research online to find the right settings to get to this point. All in all however for being a little more than I wanted to spend the headphones were well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KyleStephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good headset while it lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 5 months before the headsets started cutting out, luckily the warranty covered. Otherwise its was a good headset. While very bulky and big, it feels like quality, Its got some heft to it, its comfortable and its not made of plastic and feels very solid. Though the Chroma version is not worth it. There's barely any light coming from it and only five different animations to it, also the USB connection feels cheap and you would be much better off buying the Kraken Pro V2 instead of these. Like I said it feels quality but having it break only 5 months into its lifespan makes me think they just cheeped out on the internals and focused on the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tangled Wire is a major problem
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have written, the wire on the headset becomes tangled even if you try to keep it straight and this leads to quality issues and ultimately the headset being unusable. Bought the set in April and started having issues 2 months ago. Thought it was the computer connection but then realized after testing a few different ones that the tangled cord was the issue
customer_reviews.author: Christine Vonderach

customer_reviews.title: Defective set, but amazing for the 30 seconds they lasted!! (that's what she said)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set and instantly fell in love with the weight, feel, materials and sound. It is a sturdy headset. I have the Ornata keyboard and Mamba chroma mouse/keyboard and these headphones compliment my set-up perfectly. I plugged them in and Razer Synapse decided to do an update, which was successful. They sounded amazing for about 30 seconds during the surround configuration process.I am disappointed in that they just shut off! No lights, no response. NOTHING! Cord got super hot, so, I submitted my return and look forward to the replacement set.I can't deduct a star, that's how much I love these headphones, even though they broke, I am not even worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Wookie03

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, most functions work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's durable, able to withstand being dropped, even snagged on things from time to time. The software is easy to use, and even easier to configure the surround sound on the headset. By far, one of the best headsets I've purchased. The lighting isn't as snazzy as they make out, but then, those are just the bells and whistles. The core functionality of the headset has worked incredibly well and the sound quality hasn't deteriorated nearly as much as other headsets I've purchased in the past. A worthwhile purchase, doubly so if you can buy it while on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jsavari

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: I like this headset. Sound is good and loud, not lile other headset I haf before (Turtle beach). The cable is braided but is a bit short and thin. I wish it had some inline controls for volume like other headset had. My only concern is "how long will it last"? . As other reviews had stated is mainly plastic. I worried it will break in a long run. Got a 4 year extended warranty just in case...
customer_reviews.author: Jorg

customer_reviews.title: retractable mic keeps microphone safe for longer life, awesome headset, comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Clean, clear sound! Not distorted at all.. Worth the money!! Great headset for any gamer! Comfortable on the head & ears, for many hours. This is the best headset I have owned. The retractable microphone is a huge plus. The setup was very easy, I was talking to friends online in a matter of seconds! great gift idea for any gamer, young or old! I highly recommend if you are looking for an amazing sound quality experience!
customer_reviews.author: YellowTable

customer_reviews.title: Broken. Left speaker cuts out once every 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried this pair on 2 computers. Every few minutes the left speaker cuts out and I must re connect the usb. Will not buy from razor again, MASS PRODUCED GARBAGE sounds good when it does work I must say. But wtf razor
customer_reviews.author: NootropicsLife

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! Coming from Gen 2 Astro A50's and people say I sound 100% better on mic. Surround sound through Razer Synapse is flawless and Bass Boost gives explosion SFX and music extra oomph. Mine are fairly new (< 2 weeks) so I'll still get a headache after 2hrs of continuous use. Others say that they loosen up after a bit so I'm sure it won't be a problem long term. Chroma is a nice, but superfluous touch.
customer_reviews.author: Trey D.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones spoiled by horrible software and support
customer_reviews.text: If you want all of the advertised features of this product, you need to use the Razer Synapse software. You get to choose between Synapse 3, which has been in Beta for 3 years, or Synapse 2, which is labeled as Legacy. So basically you are paying a hundred bucks to either be a beta tester or for a legacy product. Personally, I can recommend anything Razer makes these days, they are going through a major crisis with their software and drivers. I even have a Razer mousepad that once caused my PC to crash. True story.
customer_reviews.author: grimmw0r

customer_reviews.title: best headset i had so far
customer_reviews.text: new to gaming with a headset so it seems great for beginners. mic is clean sounding and using the software the speakers get super loud but can be adjusted per the software my volume is set to 50 on the windows settings and games are very loud still tweaking settings to get loud but not too loud and best quality
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable USB headset for PS4 and PC gamers!
customer_reviews.text: My wife, my brother and I have all switched over to this headset. It seems to be the best available at this price point. It is extremely comfortable, I am a large man but these are still plenty big enough! I found myself very impressed with mic monitoring with this headset. Im able to clearly myself and even hear the room around me. It's very important to point out that this does not work with the Xbox One. However, it is plug and play compatible with both PC and PS4. The USB cord is braided and high quality and the earcups have real metal on the exterior. Plenty loud, comfortable and convenient. 10/10 will buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: ... to round out my full Razer setup with these bad boys.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but decided to round out my full Razer setup with these bad boys... man, I was not disappointed. Best headset I've ever used blowing Bose and Sonos headsets my friends have out of the water. It isn't as good for music and lacks in bass but as a 7.1 headset the distinction of where things are is amazing. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Registration debacle; almost destroyed my headphones following RAZER's directions
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea whether the headset even works. I do know that the product registration process for Razer Synapse is totally broken. The registration asks for the serial number. The RAZER help website says to “peel back the foam on the headset.” After almost breaking it, I found out the cup just rotates and comes off. The product number is also required but it’s not with the SN or on the box (might be under their stickers?). Anyway, I’m so frustrated with this process I’m going to send them back to RAZER in pieces. Total fail—nice work making your customers regret purchasing your product before it's ever turned on!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Gave as gift to gamer wife - she was blown away!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife for her birthday. She’s been on a long quest to find the right headphones. She was blown away by the sound, started to giggle the first time she hopped into a game. She finds them comfortable for long periods, and most importantly, because she wears glasses. That’s been hard to find all the things she wanted in one pair of headphones. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Ewers

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great experience
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous headset, this beats it by a lot. The 7.1 sound is great, it’s very comfortable, and the noise cancellation is useful since my setup is next to my TV in the living room. The only problem I have with it is that it makes a loud buzzing sound when I start up my PC, hence why I’m giving it a 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: jcrg.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: So far this headset have been superb. I like surround sound, bass, and mic quality. The build doesnt feel cheap and the cable is braided. The only downsides I found was that the ends of the cable feel weak because it doesnt have those guards that peripherals usually come with so it feels like it could break easily at any moment. Also i got some software glitches in the beginning but a driver update solved it. Overall this is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: jeremie

customer_reviews.title: Best by far!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! It works for both PC and console I use it for my PS4 all the time or when I'm listening to a song to practice bass. Speaking of all you have to do is edit your settings in razor synapse and it's good to go, you can personalize it from the surround sound to how deep the bass is to what color you want the lights to be on the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great while it works.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for almost a year now and have began having issues with it randomly disconnecting and making horrible popping noises. I contacted Razer support and they were unable to help me. I would steer clear of this product and opt for something of higher quality. Very dissapointed, spent way too much money and now am stuck with a dud. Also this product is not supported in Synapse 3.0 so you have to have 2.0 running on your computer to change the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, comfortable to wear, software issues frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, not the greatest software. Sems to be a constant reinstall fight to keep the software always working after updates. When software is working and not crashing, sound quality is amazing and hardware seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: northofnowhere

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had the first Razer Kraken headset for 5 years before it finally started cutting in and out and physically breaking so that one lasted a while and I wanted something I trusted and a brand I loved so I got this. I was NOT disappointed at all. I LOVE this headset. It's comfortable and the sound is fantastic. It's not the best sound quality you can get out there, but for the price this headset is pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good Headphones for the price, a lot of reviews will complain they’re not “amazing” and that’s not what you’re paying for. You’re paying for a moderate pair of Gaming Headphones. They work as expected and I haven’t had a problem with them at all, good sound, clear voice for the mic and cool colors on the headphones. Only thing is they feel cheap but aren’t. Wouldn’t recommend for young children.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while ago and wanted to use them for a little while before submitting a review. I was a little skeptical when buying these becuase i heard some really bad reviews but my set has been great. I use them for gaming and for work and they are super comfortable. I can wear them for 8 hours or more and my ears will not hurt. the sound quality is pretty great as well and the dampen sound from the outside world which is a plus when you live in a house with 5 other people. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: overall good headset
customer_reviews.text: i use this mainly for gaming, sometimes for movies and music. overall theyre not bad. had to download a driver to optimize the sound. i did notice sometimes it gets alittle staticy, over all though not bad output qaulity. the mic works amazing and the noise cancellation works great for that. little to no back ground noise. deff 4.5/5
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: You can hear mic in headset
customer_reviews.text: So if you are looking to buy this headset for use with your ps4 don’t buy this headset. The sound on this headset is great everything came in clearly but the problem is on ps4 u hear yourself talk in the headset which is super annoying and distract you during your game. So I repeat if you are going to use this for ps4 don’t get this headset
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headset!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about headsets, but this is clearly quality. The surround sound is good and cannot hear anything/no problems with mic. Also nice that the ear padding is large enough to go over my earrings. The only piece I would remind anyone looking for specific sound or gaming equipment is that this is not wireless. So if you need something where you can move farther than a couple feet away then you might want to get the Bluetooth headset, but if you want something that won't die from lack of a charge, then this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Razer Chroma v3 (yet).  Otherwise very good headset!
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound great! The only complaint I have is that they aren't yet compatible with Razer Synapse v3, so I have to run v3 for all my other Razer Chroma devices and v2 just for these headphones. They will add them eventually, but it's kind of a bummer that they aren't yet compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Came In a nice green box and packiging is great.Comes with instructions and 2 razer stickers and the headphones.The headphones are great the lights and everything is good but the headphones are very bulky which I hate and when you lower the volume you could hear like a little sound which doesn't bother me that much and for those 2 reasons I just gotta give it a 4 star
customer_reviews.author: gaby acosta

customer_reviews.title: They wear easily and not durable, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: The looks are sharp. Not made well at all and already have issues with earphones worn down and a crack. Called company and wanted to charge me more than I originally paid.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Beisrr

customer_reviews.title: Was going well until it became frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: For the first few months, the product was great. Sound was good, my ears were comfortable, and everything was going well. However, a couple weeks ago, my ear cuffs for both ears kept coming off. I have to constantly put them back on as they keep falling. Whenever I take the headset off, they instantly come off. It’s extremely annoying when they fall off mid game when I take them off to scratch my ear or something and I have to reach under my computer desk to grab them. Extremely annoying and frustrating. There has to be a way to prevent this as I don’t want to tape them.
customer_reviews.author: Seratul Ambia

customer_reviews.title: Razer hasn't fixed the wire fracturing yet.
customer_reviews.text: These just broke and started screeching at me today, i take care of my electronics, i take care of my things, i shouldn't have to buy a new headset every. damn. year. from you guys, due to subpar craftmanship/quality control.. Buyer beware, go get something better like Astros
customer_reviews.author: Justin R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gaming headset! Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I had owned the Razer Kraken 7.1 chroma headset for appx. 3 years until I stepped on it and finally got to upgrade. I am glad I upgraded to the 7.1 chroma v2. Pros: -Surround sound and mic great for gaming. -Comfortable lvl—expert -Chroma RGB works/looks great -Razer Synapse app -$$$ -Light yet sturdy and flexible Cons: - Limited color selection
customer_reviews.author: shatner

customer_reviews.title: DONT WORK ON PS4
customer_reviews.text: They are great quality, sound and design BUT, it doesnt have any button to go up or down on volume. Only the mute on the mic. This headset is for PC, they will work on PS4 but you will hear your own voice and every sound around you will go through the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: SabrinaCP

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, but not great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cons: - The cord can break at the base of the headset within a year, leaving it hard to use. Pros: - Accurate spatial audio once you get used to it - Pretty good bass, but muddies audio in excess - Basically entirely aluminum frame with very few moving parts - Extremely comfortable - Easy plug-and-play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for PS4
customer_reviews.text: Got them for super cheap and it’s the best investment I’ve had in awhile. Build quality is top notch. Love the comfort of the earcups. Sound quality is excellent. I can hear footsteps a mile away on COD. Get em.
customer_reviews.author: Skol Vikings!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound on these headsets. It's a pretty big improvement on the previous (already fantastic) Razer Krakens. It is super comfortable to wear even over long periods. The build quality is really solid. Even though it is really big and bulky, it doesn't feel or look like it because of the ergonomic design.
customer_reviews.author: Snyman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sound great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first pair from Best Buy and loved them. My daughter needed a pair so I ordered on Amazon. I’m pretty tough on earphones and throw them around aand they still work and fit great. I usually go through 4 sets of different types each year, but been a year and they still work. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne E Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset, does not cancel out noise though. Could be much better in that department. But the do work well, and am glad I bought them. Has made gaming and talking with friends in game delightful
customer_reviews.author: Michele Medema

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning Cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset and it worked perfectly fine for a few months but the cable would start to constantly twist up and id have to tediously untangle it everyday until one day the headset wouldnt work at all. I found out that if I touch the cable in a certain area or move it at all then all sound will be cut and the headset will not be recognized by my pc until I unplug and plug it back in. I have a friend who has the exact same headset with the same problem. I would consider getting a wireless headset for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great headset 💯
customer_reviews.text: All around I think it's a great headset. I bought it because my older set's (hypercloud x or something generic from Amazon) microphone was just weak, I switched to this one and it works great, and the audio is really great too for games like Tarkov where the sound direction matters
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great for teen
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son. He loves them. He especially likes the retractable microphone. The sound quality is good for gaming and he states the headphones are comfortable to wear for an extended amount of time. He’s only had them for one month but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for sound, but...
customer_reviews.text: All-in-all it's a rather good headset. Surround sound is nice, it's comfortable to fit. Don't buy this for the microphone though. It might just be me though, but it builds up a lot of pressure in my left ear. (Don't have an ear infection, nor allergies. Went to the doctor for both.) Use my other headset and I'm totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aky

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a PS4 as it says it works with it in description. It does only if you plug it directly into the ps4. So you're literally a few feet away from the console. Does not work with the controller even with an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S-W.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good. I love the surround sound for online fps games. Been told my voice sounds a lot better from those I talk to online in a regular basis. I like that they light up like my mouse and keyboard (also razer)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality is great and it is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality is great and it is comfortable, I've been using this for about 5 months until recently the headphones kept disconnecting by itself and reconnecting because of a loose wire. I have not damaged the headphones at all and this all happened by itself. I am very disappointed with the poor design of this headset and the short lifetime. Otherwise I would of given this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: the sounds quality is exceptional and the ear cups are really comfortable. With the price point you can not go ...
customer_reviews.text: The virtual surround sometimes lags or gives the wrong direction, mostly between the front and back. Also, if you ware glasses when you game, it will open up the ear cups a little over your glasses. This issue is also not exclusive to this set but I noticed more on this set than usual.That being said, the sounds quality is exceptional and the ear cups are really comfortable. With the price point you can not go wrong with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Awesomer Headset
customer_reviews.text: If you have a little extra $$$ to buy a good set of headphones....do it. Razer headphones are 2nd to none when it comes to build quality and sound!
customer_reviews.author: Hurtelli

customer_reviews.title: I like that there is not a foamy end on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these headphones. I like that there is not a foamy end on the headset that I would have to clean, like on his past set. It took him a while to get used to hearing his own voice on the headset when he spoke, but he is good with that. Razer has good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 in IC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset
customer_reviews.text: After exclusively using this headset for two years now, I will say that I strongly recommend buying it. They're extremely comfortable and they have great sound quality. The only issue that I have ever had is that my dog chewed part of the microphone and now it does not have the end cap with the red light to show that it is muted. Of course, this is not Razer's fault, but mine for trusting a puppy to be in the same room as it haha.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great value for usb headset
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is everything that you need with an easy ability to distinguish direction especially with footsteps or gunshots in game. It does not come with an on wire volume change or muter like the regular Kraken but the mic mute button on the microphone is handy. Very easy to connect to razor chroma program. The cups are comfortable and I don’t sweat because of them and are very easy to take off if you need to. robust enough to fly every week like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kendric Watterson

customer_reviews.title: The cord lets this down.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is quite good, however the USB cord really lets this product down big time. Not only does it twist and tangle in ways that mystify, but I'm pretty sure something is going on in there that's causing loud pops when no sound is being played. I've used these for well over a month now and finally decide to give up on them as I just couldn't stand the popping any more. It's too bad these were not available in wireless form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this thing! The surround sound is amazing. I can hear foot steps in games around me very accurately. I also use them to watch movies and listen to music and I am always impressed at the quality of sound. The headset is very comfortable and I wear them for 8-14 hours straight and never get uncomfortable. I take really good care of my belongings so I can't say too much on durability but it's been several months and mine have absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Headsets are good software is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Really great headphones for gaming it did take me a little bit of time to get the 7.1 surround sound to work but I did have to do some tinkering to get it to work I would preferred that they would provide updates to make the 7.1 surround sound a lot more easier to work with
customer_reviews.author: Takuminightcore

customer_reviews.title: Best headset i have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my third headset and it has to be the best i have ever had. Sound quality is great the mic retracts and its usb no more pink and green plug ins. The best part id have to say though is the headband its gonna fit any noggin and its built to last very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: I've used this on my phone,ps4, and pc
customer_reviews.text: This is the USB version. I plan on using it for my PC and ps4 but so far it works great on my phone. So comfortable , sounds great , love the rbg. Ps works great on ps4 and pc
customer_reviews.author: Flamelord713

customer_reviews.title: Razer strikes again!
customer_reviews.text: One of the more comfortable long duration headphones I've used. Wearing glasses with these causes no added pressure to head. Love the rgb, audio quality and an actually pretty good attached mic. Somewhat wish I would have guns with the plug than usb, but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: FilmCamDan718

customer_reviews.title: Great for many purposes
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is great and they're very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The mic quality is also on par picking up some asmr level of sound if adjusted right. If need be you could take off the ear padding for easier cleaning or replacement. Even has it's own audio balancing program that let's you set it to presets or customize it yourself for any audio experience you want. The padding also sorta acts as a noise canceler.
customer_reviews.author: Tyi Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very comfortable. Can wear for hours and not be irritated. Sound is amazing, I can hear everything. Cancels out all sound. Love this headset. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bailyn

customer_reviews.title: I love this headset
customer_reviews.text: Pros: USB Easy to setup Synapse RGB Comfortable Thing padding Bass Feels solid Metal headband Cons: Short cable Doesn’t come with extra pads Mic can’t be detached but is retractable Volume only changed through synapse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Razer Kraken 7.1 v2 works great Out Of Box with CentOS 7
customer_reviews.text: The Razer Kraken 7.1 worked right out of the box with CentOS 7 linux. I previously had ordered a JBL headphone and it did not work. JBL support responded that there was no support for linux. I gave those headphones away. The Razer Kraken 7.1 v2 headphone not only work, but they have great sound and the mic input is also very good. At some point I may load the software to provide finer control of the headphones, but for now it is not needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Morrisette

customer_reviews.title: mic has really good audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an add-on to my Oculus / Elite Dangerous setup, mic has really good audio quality, works perfectly in the game, I also use the headphone and mic to record memos into my cell phone for reminders later, perfect quality, I do wish they would have included form to put over the mic to stop wind noise, headphone audio quality is outstanding, I would recommend this headset to any gamer or as a gift for any gamer.
customer_reviews.author: phil HK

customer_reviews.title: It's what's to be expected from Razer
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've bought this headset (cough newer version) it'll also be my last because it works basically the same as the other version. Every now and then I get a loud buzzing sound in my headset and need to unplug it or else it violates my hearing, not to mention sometimes there's just a random buzzing. Overall it's an okay headset but I'll probably look for a higher quality one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joy B.

customer_reviews.title: The white looks incredible
customer_reviews.text: Razer definitely hit a home run with the white scheme and I wished they kept it going. Ultimately the mercury keyboard didn't work out for me because I don't like Green switches, so I returned the matching Mercury peripherals. It's a bummer they didn't work out because these headphones look incredible. The sound is very very solid as well. A little more on the bass side which I prefer for music and gaming immersion.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: yah they good at that time
customer_reviews.text: I have had a older Turtle Beach pair, yah they good at that time. Served its purpose . Then I bought these Razar Kraken 7.1 and WOW what a difference. You can adjust a combination on adjustments...Vol, bass, even seround sound. A real deal pair of headphones. Do recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Latino

customer_reviews.title: amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: these headphones have very crisp audio, and a lot of bass which can be adjusted in razer synapse. and these headsets have the best microphone i have ever tried. the chroma lighting is also amazing. very durable and can be bent and used for a long time. Highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really great! The surround sound works great. If you are a gamer looking for a good set of headphones I can't recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 pairs of headsets and this one is my favorite. Sounds quality is great, it's comfortable to wear for long hours, and the price is very reasonable. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very Frail Product and Short Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this headset a total of 3 times, all three times they lasted no more than 5 months, the first time one side of the headset stopped playing sound, the second time the same issue, the third time the microphone attached to it stopped working correctly, the cord gets tangled in itself very easily so the quality of life is not even there aswell, it is just a not very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: seth ruse

customer_reviews.title: It's just so good
customer_reviews.text: This headset is AMAZING. The bass, the surround sound, the high definition. It is unrivaled. I've been recently trying different headsets, and Corsair has a $200 headset that is definitely worse than this. For $100, the Kraken 7.1 is absolutely unmatched. No matter what I purchase, I always come back to this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Sprucewayne

customer_reviews.title: Defective, complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust the reviews for this product - I bought one that was new, and it came with a short in the wire which caused it to rapidly disconnect and reconnect - effectively making this headset an elaborately expensive paperweight.. This happens pretty often in these headsets, as I have read on many discussion boards. Don't buy this junk!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I do not personally like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I do not personally like these headphones. They are not nearly as bassy as my First Gen Kraken's. These make music sound like you are hearing it at a concert or something. Its just odd. I have played with the settings and I can not get these to sound right.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Estep Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Garbage Company + Horrible Support
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival, it was a great product, until, a LOT of headphones around me had USB problems. I've tried everything; different USBs, different ports, different laptops, etc. All to no prevail, I contacted support for them only to tell me I have to pay $10-20 shipping to send it there and back for THEIR mistake in manufacturing. Will never buy from this company ever again, and I would suggest MANY people stay away from this product and brand, unless you want a easily broken headset that costs $100.
customer_reviews.author: W.H/XxYoshie

customer_reviews.title: these are fantastic headphones. The sounds quality is great except when ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones often create an incredibly loud electrical cracking sound that makes my ears ring with pain. Other than that, these are fantastic headphones. The sounds quality is great except when it's an infernal static that scares me in the middle of the night making me throw my headphones off. Happens before every call on discord, and in YouTube videos. Can't be a software problem, doesn't happen with other headphones. (If I can get a replacement I'd appreciate it)
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and gaming, this does not include active noise cancellation but they isolate for good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was good, but other features were extremely lacking/not well thought out. I returned these for Lucid Sound LS-30’s, which are waaaaaaaaay better. Thank God for Amazon’s returns!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander DeLarge

customer_reviews.title: Total steal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best headset I've owned. Bought from Bose and Sennheiser before and these are far better. Razer Synapse and all the options with sound mixing allows for total customization.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: When you have it plugged into the PS4 only (not with pc) you can hear yourself when you talk. Hasn’t really bothered me even while using all audio so I haven’t cared to look into changing that. Great headset for PS4 and pc. 100% Worth it for what you’re paying. And I don’t get why people on Xbox are saying it’s false advertising when it doesn’t say anywhere it works on Xbox lol
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: worked good for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: worked really good but over time got quiet and had random audio cut outs, very good noise cancelation.
customer_reviews.author: John Schlappy

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I love these. My son uses them for gamin with his PlayStation 4 and I use it with my iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Princess

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Less then 2 months headset stopped working. Keeps connecting and disconnecting and making popping noises. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre feelings but asthetically pleasing looks of a quality headphones. Microphone is not clear. Virtual sound is a gimmick. The wired connection is good. Falls short on impression and other functions. Price is too high.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is one of my favorite gaming headsets. I've worn these for hours and doesn't bug me like other headphones do after a long period of wearing them. Sound quality is great as well. Mic is very clear as well. $100 though, I'd say its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Vien

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this headset!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only leaving out one star because there is no audio adjustment button on the mic. It’s just a minor inconvenience but I can always adjust the volume via keyboard. Great microphone quality with crisp sound, love the comfort of it, and the audio is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: Ok the reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is mainly because I had Amazon prime and it didnt deliver on its corresponding day but other than that the headset is pretty neat and lightweight as it was described! Especially since I'm giving this to my older sibling since he likes to game a lot and I do too but I already have one of my own and he really needed an upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: GhostlyFox

customer_reviews.title: These are my choice atm.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found a better gaming headset. The sound is very good. The fit and comfort are too. I really like the way I can deploy the mic and how soft they feel on my head.
customer_reviews.author: nibbles

customer_reviews.title: Not the best option for a PS4
customer_reviews.text: If you have a ps4 and like hearing everything from the mic then get these, but the quality isn’t too good. The band itself feels very flimsy and it’s not too enjoyable to use depending on how you want the feel of the headphones to be. The previous model was very sturdy and much better in terms or sound and such but it’s probably much better on pc.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Love

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Using on PS4 there is no easy way to control the volume levels with this headset, but despite that minor inconvenience I still give this a five star. I had Astro A50’s before these and I have found that in every way the Krakens are much better for my ears and style of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: trent stein

product_meta.title: Razer Kraken 7.1 V2: 7.1 Surround Sound - Retractable Noise-Cancelling Mic - Lightweight Aluminum Frame - Gaming Headset Works with PC & PS4 - Black
product_meta.description: Style:Kraken 7.1 Chroma V2 - BlackFeaturing advanced 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound delivering pinpoint positional audio, 50 mm Razer custom tuned drivers for gaming, and a durable, lightweight, bauxite aluminum headband, the Razer Kraken 7.1 V2 is engineered to elevate your gaming experience. An active noise-cancelling mic gives you unprecedented clarity for critical commands.
feature_bullets: BUILT-IN ADVANCED 7.1 VIRTUAL SURROUND SOUND: Delivers immersive surround sound with pinpoint accuracy
LOUDER AND CLEARER THAN EVER: Outfitted with large 50 mm drivers custom tuned for balanced and crystal-clear in-game audio and communication
CUT ALL NOISE: Fully retractable microphone with active noise-cancellation* ensures crystal clear communcation. *Noise-cancellation only available on PC
LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE: Made of Bauxite aluminum, the entire frame is lightweight, flexible, and incredibly durable
OVAL EAR CUSHIONS: Designed for full-ear coverage, perfect for long-wearing comfort.Input power: 30 mW (Max)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars996 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
